title: Flindly the Dating App
subtitle: Where two peoples meet
name: Flindly
description: Developed a cross-platform mobile application frontend using Flutter, delivering responsive and engaging UI for Android & iOS.
Implemented core features including profile creation, swipe-to-match, chat interface, and authentication flows.
Integrated REST APIs with efficient state management, ensuring seamless performance and real-time updates.
